titleStmt.title: Paracelsus his Dispensatory and chirurgery. The dispensatory contains the choisest of his physical remedies. And all that can be desired of his chirurgery, you have in the treatises of wounds, ulcers, and aposthumes. / Faithfully Englished, by W.D.
Dispensatory and chirurgery
titleStmt.author: Paracelsus, 1493-1541.
